translated: The Elder Who Gave a Resting Place🔽“I gave a leaf-hut

analyzed: kusumam okirim aha  pāsā devam guṇam
translated: all around as an offering.🔽I enjoy a very valuable,

analyzed: sayana iham tuvaṭṭāmi  vicitte puppha santhate
translated: I lie on a bed here🔽covered with a beautiful flower-strewn bedspread,
and I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of the leaf-hut.
in the fifth aeon from now
they will arise as rulers of the people.

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā senāsanadāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmā senāsanadāyakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: I have done what the Awakened One said.”🔽Thus the elder who gave a resting place, the venerable Senāsanadāyaka, spoke these verses.
The Elder Who Gave a Resting Place’s Story is finished.
